java/liquibase/ant/DatabaseRollbackFutureTask.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00004 import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
00005 
00006 import java.io.Writer;
00007 
00011 public class DatabaseRollbackFutureTask extends BaseLiquibaseTask {
00012 
00013     public void execute() throws BuildException {
00014         Liquibase liquibase = null;
00015         try {
00016             Writer writer = createOutputWriter();
00017             if (writer == null) {
00018                 throw new BuildException("rollbackFutureDatabase requires outputFile to be set");
00019             }
00020 
00021             liquibase = createLiquibase();
00022 
00023 
00024             liquibase.futureRollbackSQL(getContexts(), writer);
00025 
00026             writer.flush();
00027             writer.close();
00028         } catch (Exception e) {
00029             throw new BuildException(e);
00030         } finally {
00031             closeDatabase(liquibase);
00032         }
00033     }
00034 }
